title: Midtown walk around
content:
Gathered with my film buddies and we walked around midtown in a cloudy Saturday afternoon.
Shot with Pentax LX, Ilford HP5+, and my DKL lenses:
Schneider-Kreuznach Retina-Curtagon 28mm f/4 Schneider-Kreuznach Curtagon 35mm f/2.8 Schneider-Kreuznach Retina-Tele-Arton 85mm f/4 Rodenstock Retina-Rotelar 135mm f/4
summary:
